title: [Sermon on Luke VIII]
author: Alcock, John, 1430-1500.
notes: An edition of Alcock, John.  Sermon on Luke VIII.
Title and conjectured publication date from STC. Imprint from colophon.
Heading on A2r reads: Ihesus clamabat (Qui habet aures audiendi audiat) Luc .viii..
Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral Library.
